value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Our scouts report that Surtr has
returned to Múspell. What we don't
know is why.$k$pThis means we'll need to invade
Surtr's territory to put an end to him.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|But, Commander... How will we make
our way there?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|That part is easy. When Múspell
invaded Nifl, they opened a gate.
They've left it open ever since.$k$pOnce we pass through that gate, we'll
be in the Kingdom of Flame. We can
strike at their heart.$k$p$EFace_Pain|*cough, cough*$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That doesn't sound good!$k$pYou aren't yet well. If you want to
recover, you need some rest!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|I appreciate your concern, but we're
on the verge of taking Surtr down.$k$p$EFace_Anger|I can hold out. I must keep fighting
until the very end.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Múspell...$k$pWords fail me. If I were to imagine hell,
as described in legends...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Youch!$k$pIt's burning hot here!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The welcome is a little bit warmer than
we anticipated, too... Here come
Múspell's troops!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Of all the rotten luck... Did you filth
really come all the way here just for
me to kill you?$k$pGuess you were hoping to be
slaughtered by Helbindi, and nobody
else would do!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Damn it all! Listen up, fools! We're
retreating!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Are you sure he's a general?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|I believe his name is Helbindi. During
the invasion of Nifl, his brutality must
have impressed Surtr...$k$pHe seems to have come up in the
ranks since then. His temper is
still foul, though.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|No matter. Our strength, and the
strength of the Heroes summoned by
$Nu...$k$pThey will see us through this fight.$k$pWe won't turn back, no matter who
we face in battle. We must defeat
Surtr. Move out, Order of Heroes!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I want my brother... I want my
sisters...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|Hey, brat.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Oh!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|Still not eating? Got yourself caught
by the enemy, so you're just gonna
starve yourself. That it?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Uh...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|The hell is that look for? You hate us
that much?$k$pWell?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Of course I do! Múspell has killed so
many people...since the day you first
came to Nifl!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|Then you'd better eat up.$k$pEat, grow up, and get your revenge
on us someday.$k$pNo chance for revenge if you starve
to death.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|I guess.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|There you go. Eat. What else are you
gonna do?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|You know...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|What?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|...You're not so bad.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The hell? Shut your trap, kid, or I'll
shut it for you.$k$p$Sbs150|
